description: SLO dashboards, OTEL/Prom telemetry, slow-query killer, budget caps - no product code edits.

stories.description: Define OTEL instrumentation standards and code examples for services.
Create Prometheus rules, Grafana dashboards, and alert policies.
Implement slow-query killer + kill switch; capped budgets with alerts.
Create runbooks for perf regression, ingest backlog, authz drift, cost spike.
Define chaos drills and pass criteria; execute at least one drill.

definitionOfDone: Dashboards render with synthetic + staging data
Runbooks battle-tested in tabletop + chaos drill
